message: ya, my house is a pretty safe bet :) i got generators, tons of gasoline,  sleeping bags, camp fuel (white fuel and propane), stoves, water, canned food, guns for the zombie killing, thousands of rounds of ammo and perched up on a small hill in an enclosed courtyard with down facing windows.  think my choice of house to rent was an accident?  think again.  got to prepare for the zombie apocalypse. :)
we should definitely go shoot guns again soon... it's all to practice for the zombie apocalypse :)
not it's not, it's definitly about chainsaw and silented riffles to not awake all the others! aha
Is this degenerating into the perfect  Zombie shtf weapon topic?
At the start of the ZA i would want some Semi-Auto rifle with 30rd mags. Later when they are just roaming in hords then the silenced .22 rifle with a million rds of ammo. :)
.308 rifle with a pistol on the hip and a mossy 590 on the back. Wait, I just happen to own all 3.
mosh's house is too far away. @ericflo and @emaguire already said they'd run towards my place.
i need to get some sights.. irons won't be quick enough if they come en masse
Never forget to pack a trusty shovel. http://www.millsmix.com/store/images/forever%20lh%20web.jpg
Expendable ammo weapons will be no good in the long term. Give me a good high velocity crossbow anyday.
I completely agree a crossbow would be my best friend during a zOmbie apocolypse
